content:
Press <alt> to see the application memu.

Click on the film roll icon at top right and select "table view".

If you still cannot see the message bodies, click and drag the bottom border of the message list pane upward.

I don't know why the window control buttons do not work.
creator: mozilla98

content:
If the folders were on the server, they still are. Right click on the account name in the folder pane, select "Subscribe", and check the folders that you want to see in Thunderbird.

If the folders were in a POP account or your local folders account, you will have to restore them from a back-up copy of your profile.
creator: mozilla98
